acceptP2PChallenge(uint256).details: Accept a P2P challenge (User B stakes matching amount)

blacklistToken(address,bool).details: Blacklist a malicious token to prevent usage

claimStake(uint256).details: Claim stakes after challenge resolution Winners receive stake payout + already received points

createGroupChallenge(address,uint256,uin.details: Create a group challenge (betting pool) Users choose a side and stake payment tokens Winner receives stake from losers + BantahPoints reward

createP2PChallenge(address,address,uint2.details: Create a P2P challenge between two users User A (caller) stakes paymentToken User B (participant) must stake matching amount

getPlatformFeeBalance(address).details: Get accumulated platform fees for a token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resolveChallenge(uint256,address,bytes).details: Resolve a challenge with admin signature Winner receives: - Loser's stake minus platform fee - BantahPoints reward

setPlatformFeePercentage(uint256).details: Update platform fee percentage (in basis points, 10 = 0.1%)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifyToken(address,bool).details: Add a token to verified/featured list (optional, for UI highlighting)
